events.name: When click level & Check if the level is unlocked

parameters: "Di Awal Level, Buku Resep ini akan muncul dan menampilkan urutan warna/bahan yang harus dicampur."
"Kamu Harus mengamati dari urutan warna tersebut (contoh : merah, kuning, hijau)"
"klik botol-botol ramuan warna yang ada di layar sesuai dengan urutan yang diingat. Jika salah kuali akan mengeluarkan asap hitam dan dinyatakan gagal."

"Buatkan ramuan sihir yaitu petir,cahaya dan kehidupan dari buku resep tersebut. 
(URUTAN DARI KIRI KE KANAN)"

"Buatkan ramuan pendukung yaitu tak terlihat, darah dan stamina dari buku resep tersebut. 
(URUTAN DARI KIRI KE KANAN)"

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: ButtonStates
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Use any object as a button and change appearance according to user interactions.
description: Use the "Button states" behavior to track user interactions with an object, including:
- Hovered
- Pressed
- Clicked
- Idle
Add additional behaviors to make juicy buttons with animated responses to user input:
- Size
- Color
- Animation
- Object effects

events.comment: The "Validated" state only last one frame.
Make sure the cursor position is only checked once per frame.
Touches are always pressed, so ShouldCheckHovering doesn't matter.

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian, Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: EllipseMovement
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Move objects on ellipses or smoothly back and forth in one direction.
description: It allows objects to move:
- on an ellipsis or arcs
- smoothly vertically or horizontally (by setting one radius to 0)
- on a sine wave (by adding a force)
Instances will start their movement from their initial position on the scene.
The center position will be decided according to the "initial direction" angle and the radius.
It can be used for:
- Making objects float, such as powerups or coins
- Moving platforms
- Enemy movement patterns
- Making a player constantly turn right or left ([open the project online](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?project=example://star-seeker))

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Move objects on ellipses or smoothly back and forth in one direction.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: EllipseMovement

events.comment: Evaluate the center of movement from the object position and properties.
Update the center when the object is moved outside of the behavior.
Place the object according to the movement angle.
Save the position to detect when the object is moved outside of the behavior.
Update the movement angle for the next frame.

eventsFunctions.description: Change the turning direction (left or right).
eventsFunctions.name: ToggleTurningLeft

eventsFunctions.description: Change the in which side the object is turning (left or right).
eventsFunctions.name: SetTurningLeft

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the object is turning left.
eventsFunctions.name: IsTurningLeft

eventsFunctions.description: Return the movement angle of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: MovementAngle

eventsFunctions.description: Return the loop duration (in seconds).
eventsFunctions.name: LoopDuration

eventsFunctions.description: Return the ellipse radius on X axis.
eventsFunctions.name: RadiusX

eventsFunctions.description: Return the ellipse radius on X axis.
eventsFunctions.name: RadiusY

eventsFunctions.description: Return the movement center position on X axis.
eventsFunctions.name: CenterX

eventsFunctions.description: Return the movement center position on Y axis.
eventsFunctions.name: CenterY

eventsFunctions.description: Change the radius on X axis of the movement.
eventsFunctions.name: SetRadiusX

eventsFunctions.name: SetRadiusY
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the radius on Y axis of the movement of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the loop duration.

eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the loop duration of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the movement angle. The object is teleported according to the angle.
eventsFunctions.name: SetMovementAngle

propertyDescriptors.label: Radius of the movement on X axis

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: SpriteToggleSwitch
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Toggle switch that users can click or touch.
description: Toggle switch that users can click or touch. The switch can be customized with sprites.
There are ready-to-use toggle switches in the asset-store [settings UI pack](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?initial-dialog=asset-store&asset-pack=settings-ui-settings-ui).

changelog.breaking: - Toggle switches now use "variants", allowing easy swapping of their visual aspect. You will have to make some adjustments to existing toggle switches in your project. Follow this [migration documentation](https://wiki.gdevelop.io/gdevelop5/objects/custom-objects-prefab-template/migrate-to-variants/) to do these changes.

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: westboy, daliyoucefmedakram@gmail.com, @bouh
eventsFunctionsExtensions.fullName: Auto typing animation for text ("typewriter" effect)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: AutoTyping
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Reveal a text one letter after the other.
description: Reveal a text one letter after the other (a "typewriter" effect).
It can be used for dialogue scenes or visual novels on Text and Bitmap Text objects.
The top-down RPG example uses this extension ([open the project online](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?project=example://top-down-rpg)).

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Reveal a text one letter after the other.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: AutoTyping

events.comment: Temporary add the next word and check if it's adding a new line.

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the full text has been typed.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFinished

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a character has just been typed. Useful for triggering sound effects.
eventsFunctions.name: HasJustTyped

eventsFunctions.description: Restart typing from the beginning of text. The autotyping also start automatically when a new text is set for the object.
eventsFunctions.name: RestartFromBeginning
eventsFunctions.sentence: Restart typing from the beginning on _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.description: Jump to a specific position in the text. Positions start at "0" and increase by one for every character.
eventsFunctions.name: JumpToPosition

eventsFunctions.description: Show the full text.
eventsFunctions.name: ShowFullText

eventsFunctions.description: the time between characters beign typed.
eventsFunctions.name: Interval

propertyDescriptors.label: Detect if a new text character was just displayed
